    For MLS & transactional software

    For Listing websites

    Add an "Apply Now" button to accept applications and screening reports

    Less time verifying tenants = more time closing deals.

    Agents receive a comprehensive online rental application and tenant verification package in minutes with RentSpree. RentSpree is used nationwide and is trusted by some of the country's largest real estate organizations.

    Sign Up & Collect Applications

    Want to see how RentSpree benefits your business?

    Request a Demo

    RentSpree's online rental application platform.

    The tenant verification process takes minutes.

    1. Request applications

    Enter your applicants' email addresses on RentSpree. Each renter will instantly receive an email to apply.

    2. Renters apply

    Renters will receive a request to apply to your property. They fill out an online rental application and undergo screening.

    3. View, Print, and Share

    You can view the completed application and rental history with no additional tenant verification required.

    Faster access to reports and reduced liability

    RentSpree has teamed up with trusted credit bureau TransUnion to give you a complete application and tenant verification package. Each package includes a full online rental application along with a TransUnion credit report, criminal background check, and national eviction report.

    Benefits to your applicants

    What's Included?

    • Online Rental Application
    • Full TransUnion Credit Report
    • Criminal Background Check
    • National Eviction Report
    Learn more

    You're in great company.

    Our Clients

    We have partnered with some of the most trusted names in real estate, including the California Regional Multiple Listings Service, the largest MLS in the U.S., ziplogix™, the largest forms platform in the U.S. and various state and local REALTOR® associations.
